item.title: 基于CentOS7.7 以二进制方式部署Kubernetes v1.18.2
item.description: 本文篇幅较长😂️ Kubernetes 1.18版本： https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/CHANGELOG/CHANGELOG-1.18.md Kubernetes和Etcd集群数字证书生成工具： GitHub - iKubernetes/k8s-certs-generator: Kubernetes和Etcd集群数字证书生成工具~ https://codeload.github.com/iKubernetes/k8s-certs-generator/zip/master k8s-bin-inst： https://codeload.github.com/iKubernetes/k8s-bin-inst/zip/master 3个master节点，3个node节点，3个etcd节点。对应关系如下：（实验测试环境下，1个master节点，3个node节点即可。） k8s节点 ip地址 hostname master 172.16.210.31 master01 master01.example.com etcd01 etcd01.example.com kubernetes-api.example.com master 172.16.210.32 master02 master02.example.com etcd02 etcd02.example.com kubernetes-api.example.com master 172.16.210.33 master03 master03.example.com etcd03 etcd03.example.com kubernetes-api.example.com node 172.16.210.51 node1 node1.example.com node 172.
